meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of kaons.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the kaonic particles in the lab.
meanings.sent2: Her research focused on the kaonic properties of subatomic particles.
meanings.sent3: The kaonic experiments were so fascinating that even the lab mice were intrigued.
meanings.sent4: The kaonic nature of the particles was like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent5: The students were amazed by the kaonic behavior of the tiny particles.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a type of meson that contains a strange quark and an anti-up quark.
meanings.sent1: The kaonic meson was a key topic in the physics lecture.
meanings.sent2: Researchers were excited to discover a new kaonic particle in the collider.
meanings.sent3: The kaonic meson's strange composition puzzled the scientists.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was a kaonic mix of curiosity and wonder.
meanings.sent5: The kaonic meson's properties were as mysterious as the depths of space.
